hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the path to #Volvagia#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that plundering #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is a foolish choice.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Thieves' Hideout# is a foolish choice.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that a room containing a #large pot in the Shadow Temple# holds...^ #a Deku Shield# and #a Piece of Heart#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple GS Single Giant Pot

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Heart Container#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that lifting a #rock in the desert# reveals a #generic grotto#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that in the #river in the Water Temple# lies...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Water Temple Small Key#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that a #storm in the valley# reveals #2 Deku Scrubs#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that the #treasure chest game# grants #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that tossing a bomb will cause a Blue Bubble to go after it.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #the Pocket Egg#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that ##the Gerudo Training Ground## has #12# major items.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that the earth is round.^Just like pizza.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: Have you embraced the power of the Deku Nut yet?

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# hoards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Forest Temple GS Level Island Courtyard

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that plundering #Hyrule Castle# is a foolish choice.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #a Game Key#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Prelude of Light# can be found in #Kakariko Village#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Light Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Shadow Temple Small Key#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that a #storm within Zora's Domain# reveals a #generic grotto#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that the #Gerudo Horseback Archery# rewards...^ #a Bomb Bag# and #the Claim Check#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #Hyrule Field# is on the way of the hero.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that ##Zora's River## has #4# major items.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that spinning #Goron pottery# contains #the Biggoron Sword#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Shadow Temple Small Key#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #Kokiri Forest# is on the path to #Twinrova#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Heart Container#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Zora Tunic#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# hoards #a Forest Temple Small Key#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Zora Tunic#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that ##Hyrule Castle## has #0# major items.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Deku Shield# and #the Sun's Song#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #the Water Temple# hoards #the Song of Storms#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #the Water Temple# is on the way of the hero.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is on the path to #Bongo Bongo#.
